mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payments ( guest_id, accommodation_id, check_in, check_out, pay_amount, pay_status, pay_means, imp_uid, create_day ) VALUES ( #{guestId}, #{accommodationId}, #{checkIn}, #{checkOut}, #{payAmount}, #{payStatus}, #{payMeans}, #{impUid}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, a.name, a.location, a.image1_name FROM payments p JOIN accommodations a ON p.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE p.guest_id = #{guestId} AND p.pay_status = '완료' ORDER BY p.create_day DESC
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE accommodation_id = #{accommodationId} AND pay_status = '완료'
